thread.title: Joel Creasey says whether invited or not he will return to the jungle to help heap pain on contestants
thread.title_full: Joel Creasey says whether invited or not he will return to the jungle to help heap pain on contestants | DailyTelegraph

author: Jonathon Moran
title: Joel Creasey says whether invited or not he will return to the jungle to help heap pain on contestants
text:
NEWLY single Joel Creasey says he’ll be returning to the South African jungle whether he’s invited or not.
The comedian was one of the standout stars of I’m A Celebrity ... Get Me Out Of Here earlier this year, forming a strong bond with fellow contestant Chrissie Swan.
“Even if I have to pay for my own flights I will be there just so I can watch the celebrities go through the torture that I went through and laugh at them while eating South African chocolate bars,” he said.
Creasey takes part in a Tucker Trial — Sugar And Strife. He says he can’t wait to see what the next group of contestants have to go through. “I can’t wait to see what they go through. I feel sorry for them in a way because any of the easier challenges I guess would have been on our season, they are only going to get harder and harder. It is like the Hunger Games, the audience want more blood. There is no show like it on TV, it is so real.”
Confidential can also reveal Creasey is single after his recent break up with American boyfriend of two years, Jeffery Self.
Comedian Joel Creasey and his ex-boyfriend Jeffery Self. The couple split when Creasey travelled to Los Angeles to spend time with Self.

Sydney Confidential 0 comments Former NRL star ‘dragged woman down stairs’ Nsw Falconio killer ‘more like a prison guard’ Nsw What would PM’s tax return really show? Opinion 0 comments Robert Irwin’s animal instinct Celebrity “I was madly in love,” Creasey said. “We were really loved up. One of the hardest parts of being on I’m A Celebrity was missing him. I was meant to be in America with him for three months and when I got there it all collapsed. He sort of met someone else.”
Creasey’s life and adventures largely provides the basis of his stand-up comedy.
The breakup will be spoken about when he performs at the Just For Laughs comedy event at the Opera House on Friday and at Wollongong’s Illawarra Performing Arts Centre Saturday.
“I will talk about it but I don’t want to slam him, even though I hate him I also don’t want to hurt him,” he explained.
“I don’t want to be the bitter scorned ex but I have already slammed an ex on stage before.”
Creasey formed a strong bond with fellow contestant Chrissie Swan on the show. The 2015 Montreal Comedy Gala - Hosted by Joel Creasey 0:36 Looking for a good laugh, then watch Ten's 2015 Montreal Comedy Gala, hosted by Joel Creasey.
October 7th 2015 11 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/
